phase_3_production.forbidden_check: Scan for jQuery, img_url, Shopify.formatMoney, localStorage misuse.
phase_3_production.security_check: Run Smart Scan to catch XSS/CSRF.

brand_promise.to_merchants: Themes that sell products, not just look pretty.

final_check.question: Is this theme good enough for ME to use on MY store?
final_check.standard: If answer is NO → Do NOT submit. Iterate until YES.
final_check.philosophy: We are not a theme factory. We are artisans who happen to use AI.
